rst doc for squareCheck (modified for example)
==============

squareCheck provides functions for describing a square or rectangle.

Determining rectangle Type
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

The function :func:`source.squareCheck.get_rectangle_type` provides users with a way to provide a set of four sides
of a rectangle and returns the type of rectangle ("rectangle", "square" or "invalid")

Square Example
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

>>> from source.squareCheck import get_rectangle_type
>>> get_rectangle_type(1, 1, 1, 1)
'square'



Module Reference
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

.. automodule:: source.squareCheck
    :members:
